Virtual Reality in Psychological Research Welcome

Virtual Reality in Psychological Research Sarunė Savickaitė-Exeter Welcome Welcome to Virtual Reality in Psychological Research, an open-access resource exploring how VR is used in psychology. This book introduces key concepts, methodologies, and case studies to support learners and researchers engaging with immersive technology. Chapters Hardware Software
